measured_by: number of attributes used in WM
justification: “WM usage was calculated … attributes used in WM was calculated by counting the correct pick-ups and placements of target objects within each sequence.”
“After determining periods of encoding, model viewing time was calculated by summing up frame durations from encoding start to end.”
“Total encoding per display was calculated by summing up all Model viewing times within each trial.”
“The number of model viewings per display was determined by counting periods of encoding within each trial.”
“We then calculated search time by summing up frame durations from search start to end.”
“The number of looked-at objects during each search was determined by counting the number of objects (targets and distractors separately) in the resource pool the gaze intersected with…”
“…object viewing time… summing up the frame durations while gaze intersected with this specific object.”
“The probability of using memory for each sensorimnemonic decision … was then calculated as the proportion of sensorimnemonic decisions during which participants decided to rely on memory…”
“We quantified overall behaviour through display completion time… Display completion time was calculated by summing up all frame durations from trial start to end.”
“…and total head movement. The total head movement per display was determined by first calculating the Euclidian distance of the coordinates of the HMD between subsequent frames.”
